meanings.definition: A group of seven stars in the constellation Taurus.
meanings.sent1: The pleiads shone brightly in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: She counted the pleiads in the constellation with her telescope.
meanings.sent3: The pleiads in the sky seemed to be playing hide and seek.
meanings.sent4: The pleiads twinkled like diamonds in the dark expanse above.
meanings.sent5: The pleiads formed a beautiful pattern against the black canvas of space.

meanings.definition: A group or cluster of seven individuals or things.
meanings.sent1: The pleiads of flowers in the garden added a burst of color.
meanings.sent2: The team consisted of a pleiads of talented musicians.
meanings.sent3: The pleiads of cupcakes on the table disappeared quickly at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter mingled with the pleiads of voices in the crowded room.
meanings.sent5: The pleiads of birds chirped harmoniously in the early morning.
